answers.answer: Hi Geanie,You have nice and lovely name.How old are you? Where was impact of accident? Was it lower back or over the thighs?Did you consult any doctor then? What was the imaging study been done?I think it is your lower back causing problems. I think it might from your injury during accident causing concerns. It can happen anytime after any accident.I feel you should consult an orthopaedician at earliest and do imaging studies.What are your other associated symptoms?It can also be due some vitamin B12 deficiency, dehydration, or diabetes.I think you should also consult physician to rule diabetes status.Keep me informed about your disease progression, your decision and your health in general.Bye.

HI Dr Jain My age is 53 ..I have no medicle insurance the only place I went was to the hospital by ambulance  ..I was taken there  x-rayed treated and released ...We were on the freeway going 70mph and all of a sudden heard a lound noise and we were out control I was jerked arround alot we also hit a cement road diveder in center of freeway and we fliped over onto the drivers side of the 4by4 truck....I also got burns on my neck due to the seat belt....I did see a chroparctor for some time had some treatmrnts  I just do not know what to do at this time should I call the drivers insurance and inform them that I am  feeling this numbness and burning sensation in my thigh?

Hi Geanie,I think it is better you call your drivers insurance and inform them regarding your symptoms.I think you require imaging study as early as possible of your lower back and a consultation with an orthopaedician.I hope everything would be normal.Even in case you have lower back strain, physiotherapy is what we should look up for.Keep me informed about what the insurance company tells you and about your health in general.Bye.
Thank you so much I will give them a call monday....

question: I was in a car accident 8 months ago now I am feeling a numbness tingeling and burning sensation on my outer thigh at times the burning becomes painful what could be causeing this ???is it possible this is from the accident? can this happen 8 months following the accident ?? Thank you
title: burning
